column1: If we want real progress & enduring change - at the local state & federal level - we've got to get young people to the polls. That means making it easier to vote. Glad NY is doing its part & expanding preregistration for the next generation of leaders. https://t.co/r8ZJsESOzM

As president Joe Biden will deliver the local tax relief infrastructure clean drinking water & support for our military and veterans that the American public wants.  As voters go to the polls in the coming months I hope they'll join me & vote for Joe. https://t.co/njLg0Zhk7x

Trump has made us less safe & more isolated.  At home our political process is so fractured working families are being left behind.  Joe Biden’s unmatched record command of foreign affairs & vision for our future is the leadership we need to get us out of these dangerous times. https://t.co/arpVPsxxX6

Joe hasn’t just advocated for progressive change throughout his career he’s delivered on it - from ushering through VAWA to fighting shoulder to shoulder with President Obama to pass the ACA and support marriage equality.  I know as president he’ll build on that progress. https://t.co/XEfFPHAog5

The next president faces a difficult task: restoring the US as a global leader & bringing our country back together.  Joe Biden is the person for that job.  His unmatched record & progressive vision is the leadership we need.  Join me & vote for Joe. https://t.co/b1rm5mQcDd

Proud of my friend Beto for sharing his vision of our future with us. From fighting for a world free from gun violence to proposing a bold plan to combat climate change his campaign moved us forward & brought our divided country together.  Thank you Beto for fighting for all.

.@BetoORourke has a heart the size of Texas real experience and a vision of that strong united and youthful America that once led the world — and that can again inspire and motivate millions. That’s why I’m proud to support him as the next president of the USA.

When we got elected to Congress together @BetoORourke and I used to run early in the morning out on the Mall in Washington. Through many long conversations and during our years together in the House I grew to know and love him and his family.
